backend/main.mo: Defines the canister's data models, storage, membership, payments, deals, buyers, contracts, analytics, and integrates authorization, blob storage, Stripe, and HTTP outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking feature IDs to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑sentence summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and themes for light/dark modes with OKLCH-based color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Implements the startup state machine, identity/actor/profile initialization flow, timeout watchdog, and routing for success/failure payment pages.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Renders an access denied message with optional back navigation.
frontend/src/components/AnalysisResultCa: Displays deal analysis details including ARV, MAO, comps, and rating with styled card UI.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main navigation shell managing page state, mobile menu, and lazy‑loaded page components with logout and support handlers.
frontend/src/components/AppShellErrorBou: Error boundary that displays a fallback UI and allows resetting when child components throw.
frontend/src/components/BuyerCard.tsx: Displays a buyer’s key info, contact details, budget, and areas with an edit button.
frontend/src/components/BuyerEditorDialo: Dialog for creating, editing, and deleting buyers with form fields synced to backend queries.
frontend/src/components/ContractList.tsx: Lists contract documents for a deal with status, download capability, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/ContractUploader: Handles validating and uploading contract files with progress tracking and document type selection.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Shows deal summary including address, seller, ARV, offer, and profit with an edit action.
frontend/src/components/DealEditorDialog: Dialog form for creating, editing, and deleting deals with full field state management and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/FeatureLock.tsx: Displays a locked-feature card prompting users to upgrade to a required membership tier.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyPerforman: Generates a bar chart summarizing monthly closed profits and estimated fees from deal data.
frontend/src/components/OpaqueOverlays.t: Provides opaque variants of dialog, sheet, and select content components by overriding default styles.
frontend/src/components/PageQueryErrorSt: Shows an error state with retry, secondary actions, and optional contact support button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Initial profile setup dialog that saves basic user info using a mutation and handles validation and errors.
frontend/src/components/ProfitByZipTable: Renders a simple table showing total profit grouped by zip code.
frontend/src/components/SignInScreen.tsx: Sign‑in page using Internet Identity with branding, login button, and value propositions.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Displays a startup error screen with stage-specific hints, retry handling, and support contact integration.
frontend/src/components/StartupLoadingSc: Shows a branded loading screen with logo, spinner, and optional message during startup.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Builds a backend actor with identity handling, optional admin token init, and exposes readiness and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state, identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks CSS media query matches and exposes a mobile-detection convenience hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for backend data, including profile loading with timeouts and normalized error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind variables and styling for a dark theme with warm accent colors.
frontend/src/lib/copy.ts: Centralized text copy for navigation, errors, empty states, locked features, admin UI, and support.
frontend/src/lib/dealMath.ts: Provides simple deal-analysis math utilities for MAO, estimated profit, and assignment fee calculations.
frontend/src/lib/membership.ts: Utility functions defining membership-tier-based access and feature limits.
frontend/src/lib/money.ts: Helpers to format and parse USD values between cents (bigint) and strings.
frontend/src/lib/support.ts: Provides support email constants and functions to generate or open mailto links.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, and identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin interface for managing membership pricing, tiers, and Stripe config.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Enterprise-only analytics dashboard displaying metrics and profit-by-zip data.
frontend/src/pages/BuyersListPage.tsx: Pro/Enterprise page to view, add, and edit buyers with error and lock handling.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Enterprise-only contracts manager allowing deal selection and contract uploads.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard summarizing deal metrics and performance with charts and membership info.
frontend/src/pages/DealAnalyzerPage.tsx: Page for AI-based deal analysis with inputs for property and seller info, allowing users to analyze a deal and add results to the pipeline.
frontend/src/pages/DealsPipelinePage.tsx: Displays and manages deals across pipeline stages with creation, editing, and membership-based limits.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPage.tsx: Shows membership tiers, pricing options, and starts Stripe checkout sessions for upgrades.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays payment cancellation details and lets users retry or return to the dashboard, showing session ID if available.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Confirms membership purchases using a session ID and shows success, loading, or error states with navigation options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH-based color palettes, fonts, border radii, shadows, dark mode, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, known issues, and existing features related to fixing profile loading behavior and startup error handling.
